name: Joshua Costello
title: Founder & Lead Attorney
bio: Joshua Costello is the founding attorney at The Costello Law Group with over 15 years of experience in personal injury and criminal defense. He has successfully recovered millions in settlements for his clients and has earned a reputation as a dedicated advocate for those injured by negligence.
credentials: Juris Doctor, University of Florida College of Law
Board Certified in Civil Trial Law

education.school: University of Florida College of Law

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Business Administration
